channel.title: Projects on Shaheer Muzammil
channel.description: Recent content in Projects on Shaheer Muzammil

item.title: SURF Rideshare
item.description: An entertainment platform that places interactive tablets in ride-share vehicles for the entertainment of passengers and the promotion of local businesses and brands which provides; Free Video content to stream by Media gaints like Paramount Pictures, Vevo and many famous content creators like Tasty, The Daily Show, etc. Full iHeart Radio experience where the riders can listen to iHearts best Radio station, their favourite artists and highly engaging podcasts. Free coupons and disounts to nearby stores and shops

item.title: Vesta Audit
item.description: The application replaces manual telecom tower surveys. By digitalizing survey form data entry, syncing and report generation for multiple survey roles like Power Engineer, Civil, Design, etc. This application was sold to MTN Nigeria and JAZZ (The largest telecom services provider in Pakistan).

item.title: Customer Insight
item.description: Customer Insight Customer insight was a multi language application for Telecom Industry to monitor their network user’s experience and improve customer support. The application was meant to collect user’s network performance parameters to build coverage maps and find weak areas. The application also enabled the user to run call sms and internet speed tests for runtime diagnostics. Application Screens The application UI was based on a View Pager an the user could swipe through the dashboard and test screens.
